languages.text: "Как{mf|ой|ая} ты обидчив{mf|ый|ая}, людишко. Хорошо, хорошо, я должен". {n}Злоба небрежно шарит в собственном снаряжении, не глядя отцепляет что-то с пояса и бросает вам.{/n} "Вот, твоя компенсация".

"You're a touchy one, humanling. Fine, fine, I owe you." {n}Malice carelessly rifles through his own gear, unclips something from his belt without looking, and tosses it to you.{/n} "There's your compensation."
languages.original_text: "Как{mf|ой|ая} ты обидчив{mf|ый|ая}, людишко. Хорошо, хорошо, я должен". {n}Злоба небрежно шарит в собственном снаряжении, не глядя отцепляет что-то с пояса и бросает вам.{/n} "Вот, твоя компенсация".

traits.locale_text: "You're a touchy one, humanling. Fine, fine, I owe you." {n}Malice carelessly rifles through his own gear, unclips something from his belt without looking, and tosses it to you.{/n} "There's your compensation."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

traits.locale_text: "You're a touchy one, humanling. Fine, fine, I owe you." {n}Malice carelessly rifles through his own gear, unclips something from his belt without looking, and tosses it to you.{/n} "There's your compensation."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: “你可真是个敏感的小人儿啊。好吧，好吧，我欠你的。”{n}恶棍漫不经心地翻开自己的装备，随后从腰带上解下了什么东西，看都不看就扔给了你。{/n}“这是给你的补偿。”
languages.original_text: "You're a touchy one, humanling. Fine, fine, I owe you." {n}Malice carelessly rifles through his own gear, unclips something from his belt without looking, and tosses it to you.{/n} "There's your compensation."

traits.locale_text: “你可真是个敏感的小人儿啊。好吧，好吧，我欠你的。”{n}恶棍漫不经心地翻开自己的装备，随后从腰带上解下了什么东西，看都不看就扔给了你。{/n}“这是给你的补偿。”
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: «Mira que eres quisquillos{mf|o|a}, human{mf|o|a}. Vale, sí, te debo algo». {n}Malicia registra su propio equipo, desengancha algo de su cinturón sin mirar y te lo lanza.{/n} «Toma, en paz».
languages.original_text: "You're a touchy one, humanling. Fine, fine, I owe you." {n}Malice carelessly rifles through his own gear, unclips something from his belt without looking, and tosses it to you.{/n} "There's your compensation."

traits.locale_text: «Mira que eres quisquillos{mf|o|a}, human{mf|o|a}. Vale, sí, te debo algo». {n}Malicia registra su propio equipo, desengancha algo de su cinturón sin mirar y te lo lanza.{/n} «Toma, en paz».
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: 「細かい奴め。仕方ない」{n}マリスは無造作に装備をあさり、見ることもなくベルトから何かを取り外してこちらに投げてきた。{/n}「貴様の報酬だ」
languages.original_text: "You're a touchy one, humanling. Fine, fine, I owe you." {n}Malice carelessly rifles through his own gear, unclips something from his belt without looking, and tosses it to you.{/n} "There's your compensation."

traits.locale_text: 「細かい奴め。仕方ない」{n}マリスは無造作に装備をあさり、見ることもなくベルトから何かを取り外してこちらに投げてきた。{/n}「貴様の報酬だ」
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: "Ihr seid recht empfindlich, Menschling. Schön, schön, ich schulde Euch etwas." {n}Tücke kramt achtlos durch sein Hab und Gut, löst etwas von seinem Gürtel und wirft es dir zu, ohne dich anzusehen.{/n} "Da ist Eure Entschädigung."
languages.original_text: "You're a touchy one, humanling. Fine, fine, I owe you." {n}Malice carelessly rifles through his own gear, unclips something from his belt without looking, and tosses it to you.{/n} "There's your compensation."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid recht empfindlich, Menschling. Schön, schön, ich schulde Euch etwas." {n}Tücke kramt achtlos durch sein Hab und Gut, löst etwas von seinem Gürtel und wirft es dir zu, ohne dich anzusehen.{/n} "Da ist Eure Entschädigung."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: « Vous êtes bien susceptible, {mf|humain|humaine}. Soit, je vous suis redevable. » {n}Démon fouille négligemment dans son matériel, détache quelque chose de sa ceinture sans regarder et vous le jette.{/n} « Voilà pour vous. »
languages.original_text: "You're a touchy one, humanling. Fine, fine, I owe you." {n}Malice carelessly rifles through his own gear, unclips something from his belt without looking, and tosses it to you.{/n} "There's your compensation."

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes bien susceptible, {mf|humain|humaine}. Soit, je vous suis redevable. » {n}Démon fouille négligemment dans son matériel, détache quelque chose de sa ceinture sans regarder et vous le jette.{/n} « Voilà pour vous. »
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: "Ne hassas şeymişsin be insancık. Tamam, borçlu olayım." {n}Melanet, teçhizatlarını umarsızca kurcalıyor ve bakmaksızın belinden bir şey söküp sana fırlatıyor.{/n} "Ödeştik say."
languages.original_text: "You're a touchy one, humanling. Fine, fine, I owe you." {n}Malice carelessly rifles through his own gear, unclips something from his belt without looking, and tosses it to you.{/n} "There's your compensation."

traits.locale_text: "Ne hassas şeymişsin be insancık. Tamam, borçlu olayım." {n}Melanet, teçhizatlarını umarsızca kurcalayıp bakmaksızın belinden bir şey söküyor ve sana fırlatıyor.{/n} "Ödeştik say."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger
